darrent

Class ColumnFreeCellMove

  • java.lang.Object
    • ks.common.model.Move
      • darrent.ColumnFreeCellMove

  • public class ColumnFreeCellMove
extends Move
    Represents the move of a card from a column to a free cell

    This move might trigger auto-generated moves
